subject: Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: In February 2006, skier Dane Spencer shattered his cervical spine at the C2 vertebra, an often fatal injury.  Now he is trying to return to the World Cup ski circuit before the end of the season.
snippet: In February 2006, skier Dane Spencer shattered his cervical spine at the C2 vertebra, an often fatal injury.  Now he is trying to return to the World Cup ski circuit before the end of the season.
